text: Hello Azad. Neal here. Feel free to ask away any questions you may have and I'll do my best to answer
Nice to meet you! How's everything going for you?

I'm good thanks. Tell me a little about yourself and what you are looking to gain from the mentorship program. what aspects of VFX interest you the most? Are you currently studying  VFX or is it something you are looking to get into in the future?

So basically I have studied VFX for 5 years now, 2 years in college and 3 in university, I'm hoping to break into the industry and find a job working in a field of VFX, since I have done a wide range of things in VFX from 3D modelling to using nuke, animation and more, the position I'm in at the moment is quite cloudy because I don't know exactly what I would like to go into, I'm hoping to find a direction of what I want to do in the near future due to being indecisive of what role to pick. Currently I am making a final project that it's mainly nuke heavy, maybe I could show you? I also have a few questions too relating to VFX, companies and even you as an individual in this field, there's 8 questions in total, just to gain more insight, it's cool if all of them are not answered but I would be grateful nevertheless. And maybe taking a look at what I'm doing for my final might be cool? Checking out my concept and my nuke script if you don't mind?
yes that's fine. feel free to ask any questions you have about anything and i'm happy to look at your projecy
Awesome, I just gotta get my questions sorted and I'll come back to you about them
How's the week going so far?
going well thanks. pretty busy as usual. I'm currently leading/supervising a job for a Netflix show which delivers in March and lots to do so keeping me on my toes
